dream.title: Dreaming of creating your own 3D figure?
dream.description: We offer printing of various 3D figures of your choice. From plastic parts for cars and various equipment, to jewelry and miniatures from games, movies or from your imagination.

picture1.title: We model
picture1.description: You send your idea and we create a 3D model.

picture2.title: 3D printing
picture2.description: We send the prepared model for printing.

picture3.title: Done
picture3.description: Painting and preparing the model for shipment.

picture1.title: We consult at all stages of work.

printMaterial.title: What materials do we print with?

material1.title: PLA
material1.description: One of the most popular plastics. Environmentally friendly, biodegradable and biocompatible. Widely used for creating toys, souvenirs, and biodegradable items.

material2.title: ABS
material2.description: A plastic used for engineering purposes. It has high impact resistance, mechanical strength, and rigidity. Ensures long-lasting products and allows restoration.

material3.title: PET‑G
material3.description: A high‑strength, wear‑resistant material with a high melting temperature, absolutely non‑toxic and harmless. That’s why it’s used everywhere for creating household items from dishes to containers for storing chemicals.
